message:
PreparedStatementCallback; SQL [UPDATE hero SET     name = ?,    race = ?,    power_stats_id = ? WHERE id = ?;]; ERROR: insert or update on table "hero" violates foreign key constraint "fk_power_stats"
  Detalhe: Key (power_stats_id)=(89bed359-ad11-47dc-a3cf-53481f417442) is not present in table "power_stats".

PreparedStatementCallback; SQL [INSERT INTO hero (name, race, power_stats_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?) RETURNING id]; ERROR: insert or update on table "hero" violates foreign key constraint "fk_power_stats"
  Detalhe: Key (power_stats_id)=(e82f4730-52fc-4d19-94c1-ad61c71df9fa) is not present in table "power_stats".
